lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a good job and I feel it's my responsibility to pass my good fortune onto those who are in need
lenders.occupational_info: I handle routine legal issues that come into our office that don't require a lawyer's time.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: I can and I like to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I help dispense medicine in a hospital

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: it's more fun than borrowing...

lenders.name: Stu and Joan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other s
lenders.occupational_info: business psychologist

lenders.name: frederick
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Vulsteke-Muylle
lenders.loan_because: it's a moral obligation that  people who can afford it, share some money to people who really need it.
lenders.occupational_info: My work consists in ICT network support and programming

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to give others the means to be successful, and I have more than I need - why not share it with someone who does not?

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.occupation: executive director of a religious nonprofit

lenders.name: Martine
lenders.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship and the accessibility to affordable money to grow the business is the way forward to get out of poverty
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for IICD, a non-profit foundation that specialises in information and communication technology (ICT) as a tool for development.

IICD creates practical and sustainable solutions using both modern media (such as computers, Internet, email and multimedia) and traditional media (such as radio and television) to connect people and enable them to benefit from ICT, thereby contributing to the Millenium Development Goals. 

My own role as officer Knowledge sharing is to work with the local ICT4D networks in Zambia and Ghana and to ensure knowledge sharing between local partners and countries

lenders.name: Brandon and Sarah
lenders.loan_because: We wish to provide opportunity and resources to those with the vision and desire  to provide goods and services to their community and to establish themselves socially and financially.
lenders.occupational_info:
Brandon works in technology for an organization committed to releasing children from poverty around the world in the name of Jesus.

Sarah works as a project manager designing programs to assist the elderly living in Colorado Springs, CO.

lenders.name: EAF
lenders.loan_because: I am trying to learn compassion, equality and self awareness in a bigger world. My parents are also trying to help me understand the difference between a hand out and a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I learn a lot, but recess and art are my favorites. This experience is to teach me about being a good global citizen. My parents say, "Be a participant, not an observer."

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel connected with the world...and, it makes me smile!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a speech writer.

lenders.name: Rosie/Dr. Mike
lenders.loan_because: we believe in giving people an opportunity to better themselves and Kiva offers us that chance.  My employer gave me the opportunity to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dental hygienist working for a wonderful dentist that is committed to his patients and staff.

lenders.name: Jared & David
lenders.loan_because: cash it's not just for breakfast anymore, share !
lenders.occupational_info: A dynamic Father Son duo working to help the planet to breathe

lenders.name: Matt and Jen
lenders.occupational_info: We are both performers and writers (theater/film/television) and we own a bar in Brooklyn, NY.

lenders.name: Anastasia
lenders.loan_because: It's so easy!  It just feels so good!

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help bring some of the good fortune and blessings I've been given to others around the world.  It's the right thing to do, and a great way to do it.

lenders.name: Percy Gorham
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe it is important to help fund other people's goals, great ideas, realistic dreams, or profitable plans.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the author of several small books that are available via the internet such as Amazon, Barnes & Noble, Books A Million, Target.com, and other websites that sell & distribute online books.

lenders.name: Scot & Kristin H.
lenders.loan_because: we have been blessed with resources, so we can use that to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I review income, credit and risk to see if a customer should be approved for a home loan.

lenders.name: Mel
lenders.loan_because: I feel strongly that everyone can do Something to help those less fortunate.  It makes me feel so good when I know my small contribution can go so far.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a yoga studio and I teach yoga.  I spend my days making people feel good.  For some I am teaching them to stand on their hands for others I am simply giving them a place to relax and breath.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because:
"From those who have been given much, much will be expected."

-- John F. Kennedy

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.occupational_info: I write commercials that go on TV.

lenders.name: DAVID
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to.

lenders.name: Nils
lenders.loan_because: People who have the courage to step up need to be given the opportunity to succeed!  This is an amazing way to have a positive impact on local issues from a society that is largely ignorant of its contribution to poverty around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am part of the missing link between food consumers and farmers who grow sustainable food crops.  Through this work people are given the opportunity to be more conscientious about their food, their health and their greater community.

lenders.name: janet
lenders.loan_because: It's my way of giving back for having such a blessed life.    Some day I will volunteer on site.  Until then, the least I can do is send money.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a nurse since 1977 and worked in a variety of fields such as coronary care, post surgical recovery, ob/gyn, and emergency care.  The last 20 years was in hospital administration in a 25 bed hospital.  I now dedicate my time volunteering for various causes.

lenders.name: Graham
lenders.loan_because: This is a direct, personal way of sharing what I have wtih people who too have dreams and ambitions
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Assistant Superintendent of Education in a school district in Winnipeg.

lenders.name: BoeasGive
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are blessed to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because:
I feel compelled to give something back, but to do so in a way that empowers people to meet their family's needs.  A "hand out" to those who are unable to do for  themselves; A "hand up" for those who can.  

God bless those who developed Kiva and may God bless those whom it helps.
lenders.occupational_info: We try to help people to be successful in their businesses so that they can feed their families, educate their children and retire happily.

lenders.name: Marlene
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life.  Kiva provides an easy and affordable way for me to extend opportunity to a range of global citizens.
lenders.occupational_info: I continue to learn through giving.

lenders.name: Brand
lenders.loan_because: It's possible and it's a simple and effective way to help people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I talk a lot.

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: Because I can!

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to make opportunities available to people that really need it.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: We human beings have to help each other out at the grass roots level. We can't depend on governments or the corporate world.

lenders.name: Slayer
lenders.loan_because: I am able to reach, share and help without boundaries.
lenders.occupational_info: Every Bit Counts.

lenders.name: Therese
lenders.loan_because: I feel the money will make a big difference to someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell advertising in magazines, travel guides and association directories.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I write music for movies.

lenders.name: Duncan and Catherine
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed to have more than we really need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who have a mental illness.   We  help them get housing, benefits, medical care, and support.

lenders.name: jill
lenders.loan_because: i am fortunate that i have a good job and am able to support myself, which is very meaningful to me and something in which i take great pride.   if i can help someone make a difference in their lives by empowering them with the means to support themselves and their family, then that is a great gift i can give.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a teacher of students aged 9-13. they are a handful!!   but i love what i do!!

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: This is one way I can affect change and help someone whom I will never meet and help them help themselves.  The directness of the Kiva connection puts a real face on the need and the progress your help will do to help others.

lenders.name: Marti
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed to be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and minister to women with a desire to help them live fulfilled, happy lives in Christ.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.occupation: teacher & partner of a family website
lenders.loan_because: I feel very blessed in my life and I enjoy sharing that with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to students in grades kindergarten through 6th who have a first language other than English. I am also a partner/owner of our family website BabyNames.com.

lenders.name: Graham Henderson
lenders.loan_because: I believe there is value in learning to take care of yourself and want others to learn that.  Nothing is learned from free.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide a service in exchange for payment.  That service is something that would take time and effort for the customer, so he pays me to do the work for him.

lenders.name: Dunbar Family
lenders.loan_because: we want to help others around the world build a prosperous life and reach their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Mike (father) sells telecommunications (phone systems) and Angie (mother) sells houses.  Kids are in school.

lenders.name: Open Hand
lenders.loan_because: We are lucky to have more than we need. We want to help others who are working hard to improve their lot in life and support their families.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the saying many hands make light work and if everyone just gives a little many people will benefit as a collective.

lenders.name: Yossi
lenders.loan_because: I want to improve the life of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school student.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of microloans.
lenders.occupational_info: I make web sites easier to use.

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus Christ and want to help people.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I've been incredibly lucky and I'm happy to have the opportunity to help someone else find success.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for scripts for television and feature films. I also write tv, radio, and print advertising.

lenders.name: Marty et al
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Birch
lenders.loan_because: I am a world citizen.
lenders.occupational_info: I help develop progressive policy solutions to problems facing the the Rocky Mountain West.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to share. I feel that engaging in an effort like Kiva is the most important action I can act.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a therapist that works with people needing wheelchairs. I work in the USA but have volunteered many times in other regions of the world working to provide wheelchairs to disabled in those regions.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: We are all responsible for one another in our global community.  A loan is a helping hand for someone to help themselves not a handout to enable poverty to continue.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with a library of electronic documents on a computer.  It is the same principle as a physical library which handles books.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I started my business with $1000 cash advance on a credit card -- and 20 years of hard work.  Now I employ 12 people.  I see Kiva as a way to give others a similar opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a mail-order catalog company that sells gifts.

lenders.name: Jeneve
lenders.loan_because: 25 dollars may not seem like a lot of money to me but to some people it is the difference between being able to feed and clothe their children.
lenders.occupational_info: The most important job a woman will ever have is the job of raising their children.

lenders.name: Lisa & Ellen
lenders.loan_because: We want to help improve the lives of women in this world.

lenders.name: Thea
lenders.loan_because: my religious beliefs demand that I help make the world a more just place.  And what is better than helping others help themselves?
lenders.occupational_info: Hands-on learning is the only way....SCIENCE ROCKS!!!!

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: Loaning is a way of enabling another person to help themselves which is more valuable than just giving a one-time donation of money.  Through loaning, I am also able to re-loan the money to someone else once it is paid back.
lenders.occupational_info: I design teaching programs that help workers to do their jobs better.  In my liesure time I like to read, hike, kayak, dance and play the jembe.

lenders.name: Tim & Kaiya
lenders.loan_because:
It's an opportunity to teach my daughter about sharing, and doing it in a way that opens her eyes and heart to the world around her. 

Special thanks to my future sister-in-law for sharing KIVA with us, and getting us started.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I like this model of microfinance.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to convince institutional investors like pension funds and fund managers to care about environmental, social and governance issues.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: to spread peace
lenders.occupational_info: work on welding machines

lenders.name: Maryam
lenders.loan_because: one way we can be grateful for the opportunities which lead to our prosperity is by using those means to provide opportunities to others to advance themselves, their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-governmental organization at the United Nations in New York, and I write reports and letters, attend meetings and organize and travel to training seminars in different parts of the world.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: How not?

lenders.name: gene
lenders.loan_because: for the chance that it may help..and for those in my photo
lenders.occupational_info: yoga teacher

lenders.name: Ed
lenders.loan_because: I see all these people as my family. And that's what I taught for 34 years. I loan to family members.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.occupational_info: Home builder, carpenter

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want other people to have the chance to develop their abilities just like I had the chance to learn piano an make it my living.
lenders.occupational_info: I have played the piano since I was 7 and learned to compose, record and sell my CDs around the world. I also teach people tp play the piano.

lenders.name: Alyson
lenders.loan_because: The opportunity was given to me and it is amazing to be able to give in this way. We're all in this together.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can. Through the accident of birth, I live a very privileged life. I would like to share some of my good fortune with someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have a number of rental properties, acquired one at a time over many years. Over the years we were buying or building the properties, we both worked at full-time jobs, raised our family, and I went to school.  We no longer have to work so hard. Our children have grown into happy, thoughtful adults and the business we started pays our bills. Life is very good!!

lenders.name: Liz and Steve
lenders.loan_because: people in other countries work so hard to put food on the table, whereas in my country, we waste so much.  Contributing through Kiva to help them achieve self-sufficiency in the face of often overwhelming odds is the least we can do.

lenders.name: Young Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe that with abundance comes the responsibility and privilege to share it.
lenders.occupational_info: Heather is a full-time mom and Jim manages a group of designers in a small company that imports furniture and other products for import by big US retailers.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: It will give someone a chance to build a business and provide for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I just retired from a small company we started 28 years ago to design and manufacture custom control systems.  Over the years, we designed and built equipment for many different industral catagories.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: The need is there and I can help.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I have studied alot about the positive impacts micro-credit  schemes can make to help empower people to work their own way out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an International Development charity. I work primarily with supporters of the charity, building relations with them with the aim that they will do more and give more to fight poverty around  the world.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: People of the world must begin to understand that we create all of our problems and that only we can change the world for the better.

lenders.name: Your Healthy Home
lenders.loan_because: I Believe that we can save humanity 1 person at a time
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small organic house cleaning business

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: i want to help people everywhere be successful!

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: I was once homeless and penniless with a baby on the way. With one helping hand I was able to start my own restaurant and work my way out of bankruptcy. I will always be grateful for that and wish to pass on to others that small helping hand in the hope that they may also find success through their efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a single mother to 4 sons. I have an Italian restaurant which serves pasta, pizza and seafood.

lenders.name: Kassandra
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: Each of us can make a difference

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I want to share our good fortune with others and I value autonomy, energy and connectedness.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for my young daughter. I'm trained as a lawyer and used to work in court a lot. Being a mother is harder. And lots more fun.

lenders.name: Jennis
lenders.loan_because: Sponsoring those with spirit, intelligence and drive is a good move!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization that helps people find jobs.  In my position, I help to promote my organization to employers who are looking to hire new workers.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because:
I want people to know the freedom of
having thier own bussiness.  I want them to know people are behind them supporting them.  I would give these people the money, but I guess tho concept is to give true independence and make my money avl to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nuse in a mid-sized hospital.  Mostly what I do is help prepare Patients for surgery,  I  do patient teaching, more than actual care.

lenders.name: Clint
lenders.loan_because: Its the best way to help people make their lives and their communities better.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help people in my job everyday and on Kiva too!

lenders.name: Rebekah
lenders.loan_because: I love the stories and the hope that they invoke.

lenders.name: Edie
lenders.loan_because: I like the philosophy of helping people help themselves.  Kiva brings the world and its needs to a personal level.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: Kiva allows me to have an immediate direct impact on someone else's life.  No bureacracy, no red tape.  Just me and the entrepreneuer.  It's nice to know you can reach out and help someone with just a few keystrokes and a click of the mouse.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in helping people understand finance.

lenders.name: Devin
lenders.occupational_info: I rock out.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to get back where they are supose to be, and if i can help them then i will.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I am honoring the memory of my daughter, Lily Grace.  Money is loaned from Lily's memorial fund.  I want to make a difference in the lives of families that are working hard to build a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the legal profession.  I work for a non-profit organization and I do pro-bono work for immigrant women who have been abused.  I am also a mother to one year old daughter, Sophia.

lenders.name: Maryanna
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy the concept of sharing with others for greater good of us all. It is especially gratifying to assist those who have an entrepreneurial spirit! When we work together with passion, we can accomplish anything!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small business owner, offering health services to others... and I also do writing and consulting.

lenders.name: Jodi, Lynn and Olivia
lenders.loan_because: we care

lenders.name: Nicola
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microloans to motivated individuals are the best form of aid.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: Learning to borrow is infinitely better than learning to take a handout.

lenders.name: Ned
lenders.loan_because: The unequal distribution of wealth and the unavailability of equal opportunity is evidence of our spiritual poverty and unjust social organization. I loan because it is a question of both my personal integrity and the collective integrity of humanity as a species. For me, Kiva is part of a new global message of abundance and self-giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of psychology, science, yoga and spirituality.

lenders.name: randy
lenders.loan_because: We are unusually fortunate in North America, and I have seen the satisfaction of giving in a dear friend, a benefactor and philanthropist, who recently died.
lenders.occupational_info: doctor

lenders.name: Clara
lenders.loan_because: this is a wonderful way to help those who want to better their lives and the lives of their families.

lenders.name: Les
lenders.loan_because: I am very lucky to have all that I have. I believe it is essential that everyone on this planet have the means to lead a satisfying and productive life. This is a great way to move the world in the right direction.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the software of for the computer systems that support the Medicaid health care programs in the United States.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: It's important to recognize others need help no matter how small. I have the ability and heart to do so, I do.
lenders.occupational_info: Primarily media related.

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for all children.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children with learning and emotional difficulties in schools.

lenders.name: patricia
lenders.occupational_info: creative, original, ecclectic

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, and so little goes such a long way.
lenders.occupational_info:
I used to help people with emotional and mental 
difficulties.

lenders.name: richard & kris
lenders.loan_because:
It will help alleviate poverty in the world. 
Micah 6:8 "Do justice, love kindness, and walk humbly with your God"

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I believe Kiva has come up with a very direct way for individuals to help individuals. It is innovative and admirable and has been proven successful.
lenders.occupational_info: While retired I publish a small seniors paper for people in Thunder Bay Canada.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: I know small gestures can mean great things to those in need
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to speakers of other languages

lenders.name: Jerri
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can empower the world.  A business, a job, the pride that comes from providing for your family - I can give all that for so little.
lenders.occupational_info: My employees and I help businesses to install and use business software.

lenders.name: Omarr
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others by giving them opportunities to better themselves while establishing friendships along the way.

lenders.name: Heath
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept; and I can imagine how hard it is or would be to get a traditional loan for these people.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell tickets for sold out events.

lenders.name: Charmaine
lenders.loan_because:
Something that seems small to some of us, can make a huge difference in others life.  Don't underestimate a small gift! 

"There are generations yet unborn whose very lives will be shifted and shaped by the moves you make and the actions you take today. And tomorrow. And the next day. And the next." Andy Andrews-The Butterfly Effect
lenders.occupational_info: helicopter pilot, stay at home mom and busy girls

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I feel that i could change peoples lives
lenders.occupational_info: I go to an all girl school in New york and I work at a local drug store on register.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I feel so fortunate to have what I have and would like to share a little with those that are less fortunate. As the old saying goes"Give them a fish and they will eat for a day, teach them to fish and they will eat for a lifetime" It is great to see all these people really wanting to work for a living.

lenders.name: Jeannine and Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: What an honor to be able to help in some small way.  We we've reloaned our initial loan several times over now.  What a way to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Jeff works in the IT field and Jeannine is a fishery biologist.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I train public school teachers and teach English to speakers of other languages.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It's a privilege to participate with these hardworking and creative entrepreneurs from around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in telecommunications and so I understand the importance of computer and communications technology to businesses.

lenders.name: benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We live in the world we make, and this programme will help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company talk to our consumers - by telling people about our products and listening to them, making sure we provide the products they are after.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.occupational_info: Grad Student @ UC-Irvine

lenders.name: Digby
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in 7th grade.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to the world in a really positive way, and the knowledge that what little I do is empowering someone else's life in a bigger way, is both humbling and deeply rewarding.  Micro-loans is a brilliant concept, and I so wish many more people would get on board.
lenders.occupational_info: I live in Sydney, Australia. I prefer to write on social justice issues, but I also enjoy writing on other subjects. The power of the written word can never be under-estimated.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate supporting people that are working hard to launch/grow new and meaningful enterprises in their communities!
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies in the consumer and entertainment realms promote their brand and tell their stories to the media and other audiences.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Student studying Economics and International Development

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place by offering oportunities to people around the world. I also want to learn about what it takes to run a business from the feed back I get from the entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school at East Lansing High. I'm in 10th grade and am involved in school sports. I get good grades and am interested in loaning out money to learn about businesses.

lenders.name: Keya
lenders.loan_because: I returned home early from the Peace Corps due to illness.  This is a way that I can continue to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist the seniors in our community to obtain food, health care and in-home assistance so that they remain independent, healthy and safe.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.occupational_info: High School Teacher- Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA

lenders.name: Garrett
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and hope to be able to be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Lutheran Pastor in the Evangelical Lutheran Church in America

lenders.name: Kat
lenders.loan_because: This sort of system ensures that the money I give is being used to truly improve people's lives around the world in meaningful, long-term ways. It's sort of like the saying: If you give a man a fish, he will eat for a day, If you teach a man to fish, he will eat for a lifetime. These loans help me help recipients to provide for themselves. I really like that.

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: Money makes the work go round and I support entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Katharine
lenders.loan_because: I want you to have an opportunity to try at something you might not otherwise get.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist customers with financial matters.  This participation (loan with Kiva) was a gift that I am passing on.

lenders.name: Danna
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Robynn
lenders.loan_because: It is an uplifting and inspiring process. People helping people all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Health care professional, who cares for women through pregnancy and help them bring their babies into the world.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: Though I have little by my own country's standard, I have so much more than those in the third world.  I can give a bit to give them so much.

lenders.name: Michael
